text: Inna 'Anzalna At-Tawraata Fiha Hudaan Wa Nurun Yahkumu Biha An-Nabiyuna Al-Ladhina 'Aslamu Lilladhina Hadu Wa Ar-Rabbaniyuna Wa Al-'Ahbaru Bima Astuhfizu Min Kitabi Allahi Wa Kanu `Alayhi Shuhada'a Fala Takhshaw An-Nasa Wa Akhshawni Wa La Tashtaru Bi'ayati Thamanaan Qalilaan Wa Man Lam Yahkum Bima 'Anzala Allahu Fa'ula'ika Humu Al-Kafiruna
